subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Clint Bowyer edged Martin Truex Jr. for the pole in qualifying for the opening race of Nascar’s Chase for the Nextel Cup championship. Bowyer, the 45th of 49 drivers to make a qualifying attempt on the 1.058-mile oval at New Hampshire International Speedway, turned a fast lap of 130.412 miles an hour to knock Truex (130.255) off the top spot for tomorrow’s Sylvania 300.
